title: Drawing, "Madonna and the Infant, St. Jerome, Mary Magdalene and Angels, after Correggio", 1818
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and brown wash on paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 90, Divino Correggio Parma; inscribed on verso: Bologna 1811; Bologna 11 novembre 1818 Per essere novi nelle produzioni delle belle arti bisogna studiare sempre li primi bravi maestri antichi
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Verso: five studies of gothic monuments
